trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of TableMapping objects, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref>, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de objetos de TableMapping e é implementado pelo <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"> </xref>, que é utilizado em comum pelos fornecedores de dados .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The ITableMappingCollection interface allows an inheriting class to implement a TableMapping collection.
trans-unit.target: A interface ITableMappingCollection permite uma classe inheriting implementar uma coleção de TableMapping.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [DataAdapter DataTable e mapeamentos DataColumn](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the ITableMappingCollection interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits ITableMappingCollection.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação não cria uma instância da ITableMappingCollection interface diretamente, mas cria uma instância de uma classe que herda ITableMappingCollection.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit ITableMappingCollection must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: As classes que herdam ITableMappingCollection tem de implementar os membros herdados e definir normalmente membros adicionais para adicionar a funcionalidade específica do fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: For example, the ITableMappingCollection interface defines one implementation of the <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a interface ITableMappingCollection define uma implementação do <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por sua vez, a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection>classe herda este método e define duas sobrecargas adicionais de <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Adds a table mapping to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um mapeamento de tabela à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da tabela de origem.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> tabela.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the newly-mapped <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a recentemente-mapeados <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection contains a table mapping with the specified source table name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção contém um mapeamento de tabela com o nome da tabela de origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da tabela de origem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a table mapping with the specified source table name exists, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um mapeamento de tabela com o nome da tabela de origem especificada existe, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the TableMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de TableMapping com especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> nome da tabela.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""> </xref> tabela dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The TableMapping object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table name.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de TableMapping com especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""> </xref> nome da tabela.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização do <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"> </xref> objeto dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da tabela de origem.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: A localização com base em zero do <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"> </xref> objeto dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*> name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a instância do <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"> </xref> com especificado <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*>nome.</xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"> </xref> com especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*> name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"> </xref> objeto especificado com <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*>nome da coleção.</xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*>

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""> </xref>.
